channel.title: Add a simple starter?Pi?Bankhandler
channel.description:
Pi source 317
How do i add A simple starter for just each and every new account. But you goda wait 15 minutes to trade/drop an item.
Also got this error compiling client wth is it?
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/dnyr00.png[/img]
Also added new npcs bankers. How can i make it so when u click on them it opens bank. I think it's in actionhandler. But what is the code/command thingy?
Also all npcs face south how can i fix?

item.title: Add a simple starter?Pi?Bankhandler
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Error is self explanatory, happened to me a while back because my file was hidden, or try compiling in a different directory. Though I’m sure there are other reasons those are the ones which used to happen to me.

Read full topic

That my friend is an error. Errors happen when you code wrong. Therefor you coded wrong.
